scripts.build: rimraf dist && npm run client_dev && npm run server_dev
scripts.build_demo: npm run client_demo && npm run server_demo
scripts.build_pro: npm run client_pro && npm run server_pro
scripts.client_pro: cross-env NODE_ENV=production API_ROOT=https://api.XXXX.com BRAND=mrc webpack --config build/webpack.client.config.js --progress --hide-modules
scripts.server_pro: cross-env NODE_ENV=production API_ROOT=https://api.XXXX.com BRAND=mrc webpack --config build/webpack.server.config.js --progress --hide-modules
scripts.client_demo: cross-env NODE_ENV=production API_ROOT=https://demo-api.XXXX.com BRAND=mrc webpack --config build/webpack.client.config.js --progress --hide-modules
scripts.server_demo: cross-env NODE_ENV=production API_ROOT=https://demo-api.XXXX.com BRAND=mrc webpack --config build/webpack.server.config.js --progress --hide-modules
scripts.client_dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=production API_ROOT=https://demo-api.XXXX.com BRAND=mrc webpack --config build/webpack.client.config.js --progress --hide-modules
scripts.server_dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=production API_ROOT=https://demo-api.XXXX.com BRAND=mrc webpack --config build/webpack.server.config.js --progress --hide-modules
